objects.text:
• Pro-Level Active Noise Cancellation
• Transparency Mode
• Personalised Spatial Audio
• Premium Comfort Design

product_details.name: Apple AirPods Max Wireless Over-Ear Headphones, Pro-Level Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency Mode, Personalised Spatial Audio, USB-C Charging, Bluetooth Headphones for iPhone - Starlight
product_details.description: AirPods Max, the ultimate listening experience. Now in five new colours. An Apple-designed driver provides high-fidelity audio. Every detail, from canopy to cushions, has been designed for an exceptional fit. Pro-level Active Noise Cancellation blocks outside noise, while Transparency mode keeps you connected to your environment. Updated with a USB-C connector for even more convenient charging.

banner_details:
The banner presents a premium tech product promotion with a modern and immersive design layout. It features a bold, catchy title using text layers `heading_1` and `heading_2`, presented in a large, white, uppercase font to command immediate attention. Below the title is a muted subheading via the `subheading` layer that introduces the product name in an elegant beige tone. A clean divider (`decorative`) separates the title area from a bullet-point feature list (`description`), styled in white and aligned vertically for readability. Large text in `price` emphasizes product affordability, followed by a beige rectangular button (`cta_background`) with dark text (`cta`) prompting user action. The banner includes a sleek, angled geometric background in dark and light gradients, complemented by soft circular and diamond patterns for visual interest. A realistic product image (`product_image`) on the right draws attention with significant scaling and crisp quality.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Slate: #1A1A22
- Charcoal Gray: #2E2E36
- Warm Beige: #DFD8CE
- Soft Taupe: #C4BFB6
- White: #FFFFFF
- Accent Outline: #85817A (used in subtle graphics)
product_color: The product image showcases a set of headphones with a clean and sophisticated color palette, mainly focusing on neutral, warm tones. The dominant colors are a soft champagne gold for the ear cups (#D6CBB8) and a creamy beige for the mesh and headband (#EFE6DA). Metallic accents in silver (#C8C8C8) add refinement and contrast, while subtle shadows and highlights blend the tones seamlessly, creating a premium, elegant aesthetic. These hues are harmoniously integrated, with the soft textures enhancing light diffusion and depth. Ideal banner colors would include champagne gold, creamy beige, pearl white (#F7F5F2), and pale taupe (#D1C7BA).
